tweets.text1: Who invented #Bitcoin ? There's a lot more to the question than you might think.  http://bit.ly/2GxAUSV

tweets.name: Advanced Blockchain AG
tweets.text1: Just as terms changed and took on new meaning as the internet evolved, we may see similar progressions in the crypto world. Either way, staying informed is key.
tweets.text2: Do you know the difference between #blockchain and #DLT? http://bit.ly/2ETIxpv

tweets.name: Advanced Blockchain AG
tweets.text1: Der Aktionär TV met up with @social_nakamoto founder and Advanced Blockchain AG CVO, Robert A. Küfner, to discuss the evolution of DLT and the @iotatoken Project. @deraktionaertv #Blockchain #IOTA #Tangle

tweets.name: Advanced Blockchain AG
tweets.text1: The first blog in the @social_nakamoto Knowledge Base series sheds light on the evolution of the ledger, and the natural next step - #DLT. #Blockchain #Tangle
tweets.text2: 'What is DLT?' is available here: https://bitly.com/

tweets.name: Advanced Blockchain AG
tweets.text1: The #Blockchain, #Tangle & Beyond event series took the Advanced Blockchain AG team to North America. CEO Michael Geike gave his first presentations of 2018 alongside #IOTA Developers and members of the IOTA Foundation. @iotatoken
